title: League of Legends - World Champion 2015 | Melbourne Viewing party at Crown Casino

embed.description: League of Legends 2015 Worlds Stadium Experience - Melbourne | Facebook

body:
Silicon Sports with Village Cinemas will be hosting our very own Stadium Event at Melbourne’s Crown Casino for League of Legends World Final. 

You will have your very own luxurious seat with heaps of legroom, wide armrests, Dolby Atmos sound all while watching the lower bracket and grand final on the massive Vmax screens 

Enoy the HD stream  and get involved in your eSports community. 

Learn more about the Silicon Sports eSports community at;

[Our Website ](http://siliconsports.net/)

[Our Facebook Page](https://www.facebook.com/SiliconSports)

[Out Twitter Feed ](https://twitter.com/SiliconSports?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor)
